name: harshly
content:
harshly adverb
(UNKINDLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 in an unkind or severe way: I thought she'd been treated too harshly. Roosevelt was often criticized harshly in her time as first lady.
More examplesFewer examplesI feel like crying when someone speaks to me harshly.She lost her parents and was raised harshly in a convent.He has been harshly critical of the Pentagon's handling of the matter.
